ai-mn113:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

ai-mn113:3.4_0: ‘I have gone forth from an eminent family, unlike these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:3.5_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
